about-me.firstparagraph: I am a Front-end developer based in Troisdorf, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position. My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make me a valuable member for your team.
about-me.secondparagraph: If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!
about-me.title: Translation Demo

projects.headertext: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
projects.firstprojecttext: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.secondprojecttext: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
projects.thirdprojecttext: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
projects.title: Translation Demo
